description: Returns the details for the requested template. Other template APIs are:

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: A unique identifier of a template.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp at which the resource was created.

nested_items.name: deleted
nested_items.description: Denotes whether or not the resource has been deleted.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the template.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp at which the resource was created or last modified.

nested_items.name: layoutConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration of layouts associated to the template.

nested_items.name: requiredFields
nested_items.description: A list of fields that must contain a value for a case to be successfully created with this template.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: A list of case rules (also known as case field conditions) on a template.

nested_items.name: caseRuleId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of a case rule.

nested_items.name: templateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the template.

nested_items.name: templateId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of a template.
